name: luma-monorepo
description: Zero-downtime deployments for your own servers - Monorepo
author: Elitan

scripts.build: bun run build:cli && bun run build:proxy
scripts.release:patch: cd packages/cli && npm version patch && git push origin main --tags && bun publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: cd packages/cli && npm version minor && git push origin main --tags && bun publish --access public
scripts.release:major: cd packages/cli && npm version major && git push origin main --tags && bun publish --access public
